headline.main: Nassau Colonists To Be Tea Guests; Governor and Lady Dundas to Be Hosts at Garden Party In Bahamas on March 14

lead_paragraph: NASSAU, Bahamas, March 2--An event of widespread interest to Winter colonists, all-year residents and guests at the British Colonial Hotel is the garden party and tea to be given by the Governor and Lady Dundas in the gardens of Government House on the afternoon of ...
